Posts.Content: Sent you a private reply- I understand exactly what you are going through...
Posts.Title: New to this board and scared

Posts.Content: Well- had the lumpectomy today- it is not that bad. I am a little sore, but other than that, I am ok.  Now the waiting for the testing of the tumor. not fun.
Posts.Title: Worried but dont know for sure...

Posts.Content: Approx. two weeks ago I felt a little bump on my left breast- and after calling the doctor and waiting for my period to go away (just so I knew it was not a false thing related to that), I went to the gyn. doctor. She scheduled me immediately for a mammogram, an ultrasound, and for a surgical consult. All of this mainly because both my mom and grandmother have had breast cancer (my mom is still on chemo- but two years later, no reoccurance so far). The mammogram came back negative, but the ultrasound showed a 3 mm mass. The surgeon said it has to come out- no waiting around... because if it is cancer- six months could make it a lot worse.  I am having a lumpectomy on july 2nd and I will be honest with you- I am worried it will come back as positive. I just lost my husband six months ago to esophageal cancer- so cancer is not new to me- but I still dont want it. I keep thinking, I cant believe it! Can life be this unfair?
Posts.Title: Worried but dont know for sure...
